Acid Ammunition (Greater).name: Acid Ammunition (Greater)
Acid Ammunition (Greater).description:
Ammunition any

Activate 1 Interact

When activated, the reservoir of alchemical reagents in elemental ammunition atomizes on impact, dealing @Damage[3d4[persistent,acid]] acid, cold, electricity, fire, or poison damage to the target and [[/r (3[splash])[acid]]]{3 splash damage} in addition to the damage the attack normally deals. Each damage type requires a different formula, and the ammunition gains a trait matching the damage type.
